title: MacBook Pro 16 inch 2019 stuck in recovery
message:
Good day guys . I have a MacBook Pro 16 inches that is stuck in recovery, sometimes it would boot and other times it’s just stuck in recovery, when I run DFU, I get error 36

please do point me to a direction on what I could do :

title: MacBook Pro 16 inch 2019 stuck in recovery
message: Did you try DFU revive, or restore?

title: MacBook Pro 16 inch 2019 stuck in recovery
message: Have same issue with a2159 820-01598! After DFU restore or revive gives error comes back in recovery mode.

title: MacBook Pro 16 inch 2019 stuck in recovery
message:
Am so sorry for the response delay, I was under the impression I would get a notification when you respond, so I decided to manually go to the post, and only then did I find your response. Thank you for always taking time from your busy schedule. 

I try DFU but only get error 36

title: MacBook Pro 16 inch 2019 stuck in recovery
message: Check if you can boot in safe mode.
